user.title: Violet Pool Setup Assistant
user.description:
Choose whether you want to start the configuration wizard immediately or open the detailed documentation first.

Documentation: [Configuration Guide](https://github.com/xerolux/violet-hass/blob/main/docs/help/configuration-guide.en.md)

Support & Feedback: https://github.com/xerolux/violet-hass/issues

data_description.action: Open the documentation or start the setup directly.

disclaimer.title: Safety and Liability Notice
disclaimer.description:
⚠️ **Safety Warning**

This integration provides remote control for pumps, heaters, lights and dosing systems. Incorrect configuration may cause equipment damage, personal injury or chemical overdosing. Make sure you understand all safety features and keep manual overrides accessible.

Please review the [Configuration Guide](https://github.com/xerolux/violet-hass/blob/main/docs/help/configuration-guide.en.md) before you continue.

data.agreement: I accept all risks and have read the full disclaimer.

help.title: Help & Documentation
help.description:
Read the [Configuration Guide](https://github.com/xerolux/violet-hass/blob/main/docs/help/configuration-guide.en.md) for step-by-step instructions, safety notes and feature explanations.

Need assistance or want to share feedback? Open an issue at https://github.com/xerolux/violet-hass/issues.

Project repository: https://github.com/xerolux/violet-hass

Click **Next** to return to the main menu.

connection.title: Controller Connection
connection.description:
Connect your Violet Pool Controller to Home Assistant. Ensure the controller shares the same network and the API is reachable.

Additional documentation: [Configuration Guide](https://github.com/xerolux/violet-hass/blob/main/docs/help/configuration-guide.en.md)

data_description.username: Optional username if authentication is enabled
data_description.device_name: Friendly name shown in Home Assistant
data_description.device_id: Unique ID if multiple controllers exist

pool_setup.title: Pool Configuration
pool_setup.description: Provide pool size, type and disinfection method. These values are used for runtime optimisation, energy management and dosing calculations.

feature_selection.title: Enable Smart Features
feature_selection.description: Enable only the features your pool installation actually uses. This keeps resource usage low and the UI tidy. You can adjust the selection anytime in the options.

data_description.enable_filter_control: Control the filter pump on demand

sensor_selection.title: Select Sensors
sensor_selection.description:
Choose which sensors you want to see in Home Assistant. Enable or disable individual sensors to keep your dashboard clean and focused.

By default, all available sensors are selected. You can adjust this selection anytime in the options.

init.title: Adjust Pool Settings
init.description:
What would you like to configure?

Enable/disable features
Select sensors
Change settings

You can always return to this selection.

data_description.polling_interval: Fetch data every X seconds (10-60s recommended)
data_description.timeout_duration: Max. wait time for controller responses
data_description.retry_attempts: Number of retries on connection errors
data_description.pool_size: Water volume in m³ for accurate calculations

features.title: Enable/Disable Features
features.description:
Choose the features you want to use

Enabled features will be shown in Home Assistant
Disabled features will be hidden

Enable only what you really need - keeps the interface clean!

sensors.title: Select Sensors
sensors.description:
Choose which sensors should be displayed

Only selected sensors will be shown in Home Assistant
Changes take effect immediately

Select only the sensors you really want to monitor!

settings.title: General Settings
settings.description:
Adjust the technical parameters

Polling Interval: How often data is fetched
Timeout: Maximum wait time for responses
Retries: Number of retry attempts

Default values work for most setups!

turn_auto.name: Activate AUTO Mode
turn_auto.description:
Switches devices to intelligent automatic mode.

The system now takes over optimal control based on sensor data and schedules.

entity_id.name: Devices to Control
entity_id.description: Select the devices to switch to AUTO mode.

auto_delay.name: Delay (seconds)
auto_delay.description: Wait time before AUTO mode is activated (0-86400s).

set_pv_surplus.name: Use PV Surplus
set_pv_surplus.description:
Activates photovoltaic surplus mode for optimal solar power usage.

Pool devices are automatically operated with excess solar power.

manual_dosing.name: Manual Dosing
manual_dosing.description:
Starts manual dosing for the desired duration.

Caution: Avoid overdosing! Always check water values first.

entity_id.name: Dosing System
entity_id.description: Select the dosing system (pH+, pH-, Chlorine, etc.).

duration_seconds.name: Dosing Duration (seconds)
duration_seconds.description: How long should dosing run? (1-3600s, start with short times!)

test_output.name: Output Test Mode
test_output.description: Temporarily activates a controller output for diagnostics. Make sure no people or equipment are at risk while the output is forced.

output.name: Output Identifier
output.description: Identifier such as PUMP, HEATER or SOLAR

set_temperature_target.name: Set Target Temperature
set_temperature_target.description:
Sets the desired pool temperature.

The controller automatically heats to this temperature and maintains it.

set_ph_target.name: Set pH Target
set_ph_target.description:
Defines the ideal pH value for automatic dosing.

Recommended range: 7.0-7.4 for optimal water quality and skin compatibility.

set_chlorine_target.name: Set Chlorine Target
set_chlorine_target.description:
Determines the target chlorine content for safe disinfection.

Sufficient chlorine eliminates bacteria, too much irritates skin and eyes.

target_value.name: Chlorine Target (mg/l)
target_value.description: Desired free chlorine content (0.3-1.5 mg/l recommended).

trigger_backwash.name: Start Backwash
trigger_backwash.description:
Starts a filter backwash for cleaning.

Removes dirt and deposits for optimal filter performance.

start_water_analysis.name: Start Water Analysis
start_water_analysis.description:
Starts an automatic water analysis of all parameters.

Measures pH, chlorine, temperature and other values for optimization suggestions.

set_maintenance_mode.name: Maintenance Mode
set_maintenance_mode.description:
Enables/disables maintenance mode.

In maintenance mode, all automation is paused for safe pool work.

enable.name: Enable Maintenance Mode
enable.description: On: Stop all automation | Off: Resume normal operation.

set_all_dmx_scenes_mode.name: Control DMX Lighting
set_all_dmx_scenes_mode.description:
Controls all DMX light scenes simultaneously.

Perfect for uniform light effects or complete on/off switching.

device_id.name: Pool Controller
device_id.description: Violet Pool Controller with DMX output.

set_digital_input_rule_lock_state.name: Lock Switching Rule
set_digital_input_rule_lock_state.description:
Locks or unlocks digital switching rules.

Prevents unwanted triggering during maintenance or faults.

device_id.name: Pool Controller
device_id.description: Violet Pool Controller with digital rules.

rule_key.name: Rule Number
rule_key.description: Number of the rule to lock (DIRULE_1 through DIRULE_7).

trigger_digital_input_rule.name: Trigger Switching Rule
trigger_digital_input_rule.description:
Manually triggers a digital switching rule.

Useful for testing automation or manual control when needed.

device_id.name: Pool Controller
device_id.description: Violet Pool Controller with the rules.

rule_key.name: Rule Number
rule_key.description: Which rule to trigger? (DIRULE_1 through DIRULE_7)
